analysis.Summary: Vue.js component for rendering and handling a “Create New Voting” form. It initializes a reactive voting object, displays a details form, and submits the data via store actions.
analysis.Purpose: Provides the UI and logic needed to collect voting details from the user and dispatch a create action to the global store.

Components.name: FormVotingDetails
Components.responsibility: Renders input fields for title, description, start and end dates and binds them via v-model to the parent’s newVoting object.

Functions.name: createVoting
Functions.purpose: Asynchronously dispatches the newVoting data to the votings store to create a voting entry.
Functions.returns: Promise resolving when the store action completes

analysis.Usage: Imported into a router view or parent component for the “create voting” page. Renders when user navigates to voting creation and is hooked to the votings store.
Notes: Uses <script setup> Composition API for concise component logic.
Lacks a dedicated <style> section—styles are inherited or handled globally.
Contains a placeholder comment for redirect or success notification after creation.
Relies on a v-model binding to a nested component to keep form state in sync.
